overview:
Michael Chou is a member of the investment team at Revolution Growth, a Washington D.C. based private equity firm which invests in and actively helps build disruptive, innovative, and significant new consumer companies.

Prior to joining Revolution Growth, Michael was a member of the Technology Mergers & Acquisitions team at Perella Weinberg Partners in San Francisco. While at Perella Weinberg, Michael advised companies such as Google and Hewlett-Packard, and was an active member of the recruiting team.

Michael was previously at Barclays Capital, where he advised on a number of M&A, IPO, and restructuring transactions.

Michael received his A.B. in Economics from Princeton University.
